description: The web platform running the winning campaign of the next President of France, Emmanuel Macron, is made with Symfony and is open source.
title: An open-source web platform for the new President of France

author: talkSPORT
description: Gael Clichy has confirmed he will NOT be a Manchester CIty player next season. The France defender, who joined City in the summer of 2011, is out of contract at the end of the 2016/17 season and will not be signing a new deal with the Etihad Stadium club. When asked at a question and answer session if he would be playing with Joe Hart next season, the 31-year-old said: "It's hard. I'm not sure whether or not Joe will be here next season, and I won't be here next season."
title: Gael Clichy: France defender confirms he is leaving Manchester City when his contract expires in the summer

author: Samuel Luckhurst
description: The France international is understood to be the top transfer priority at Old Trafford this summer
title: Griezmann discusses Manchester United transfer on French TV

author: The Economist
description: A month ahead of legislative elections, France’s president anchors himself in the centre
title: Emmanuel Macron appoints a post-partisan government

author: Grace Macaskill
description: After quitting her Tibetan Buddhist monastery in France Damcho Dyson, 45, spends her weekends cavorting in latex at fetish clubs.
title: Tibetan nun becomes fetish queen after Indian massage 'reawakened her sexuality'

description: Marine Le Pen is to abandon all plans to leave the European Union and restore the French franc, accepting that her high-risk strategy has proved a costly error for the party.
title: Marine Le Pen abandons Frexit crusade 'error'

author: Reuters Editorial
description: The popularity of France's new president is around the same as his immediate predecessors when they took office, an Ifop poll showed on Sunday, in contrast to a survey that found Emmanuel Macron had the lowest confidence ratings in more than 20 years.
title: Macron's popularity similar to predecessors as mandate kicks off: poll

author: Manju V
description: About 70 airlines across the world offer inflight internet letting passengers email, livestream, use social media, download movies and even make calls. These include carriers that fly into India like Air France, Lufthansa, British Airways, Singapore Airlines, Emirates and Etihad.
title: Internet on flights likely by August-end - Times of India

author: Ben Chu
description: Brexit can be an "opportunity" for the eurozone's financial system, France's finance minister, Bruno Le Maire, has said. Mr Le Maire was speaking at a joint press conference with his German counterpart Wolfgang Schauble. European politicians are hoping to force the relocation of the lucrative business of clearing euro-denominated derivatives out of the City of London and into the European Union after Britain leaves the bloc in 2019.
title: A French finance minister says Brexit is an 'opportunity' for the eurozone financial sector

author: talkSPORT
description: Atletico Madrid striker Antoine Griezmann has said there is a 'six out of 10' chance of him joining Manchester United this summer. The France international has been consistently linked with a move to Old Trafford in recent months and it now seems there could be some substance to the speculation. Griezmann, 26, made the admission as a guest on the French TV programme Quotidien. Asked about the plausibility of a move to United, Griezmann agreed it was "possible". When pressed further and asked the probability on a scale of one to 10, Griezmann said: "Six."
title: Manchester United FC news: Antoine Griezmann claims there is 'six out of 10' chance of Old Trafford move
